promptVersions.body:
Submit your leave requests in just a few clicks and track their status in real time.


• See your available leave balances  

• Check your leave history and HR adjustments  

• View your approved leaves and public holidays on your calendar

How to Manage My Requests
promptVersions.description: Prompt for employees explaining how to escalate a pending leave request to a senior manager and automatically synchronize the approval process using the new feature powered by FlowApprovalSynchronizer.
promptVersions.imageAltText: Screenshot of the employee leave request page and calendar
promptVersions.title: Request and Track Your Leave Easily
